question1.title: What does 1 flow include?
question1.answer: An end-to-end process with 1 trigger and 1 business result, up to 3 systems and 1 channel. With logging, error handling and KPI widget.

question2.title: Can I add more flows or modules?
question2.answer: Yes. Use included hours, extra hours or add add-ons/AI Systems to scale.
